definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: exact meaning uncertain; prob, either handle, or be equipped with (cf. perh. Ar. nasaqa etc., sub I. [[נשׁק]]);—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pl. cstr. [[נשְׁקֵי]]:—[[קֶשֶׁת]] ´[[נ]] 1Ch 12:2 equipped with the bow, so 2Ch 17:17 (+ [[מָגֵן]]); [[רוֹמֵי קֶשֶׁת]] ´[[נ]] Ps 78:9 is difficult, ´[[ר]] apposs. of ´[[נ]] acc. to Hup-Now Bae al. (Ges:§ 130 e); del. [[רוֹמֵי]] as explan. gloss Hup Hi Che Kau; del. ver. as gloss Hup Kau Bae.
